## TileResourceUsage interface

An object that contains information about resources used by a tile.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TileResourceUsage 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [estimatedMemoryUsage](./harp-mapview.tileresourceusage.estimatedmemoryusage.md) | number | The estimated memory usage, in bytes. |
|  [numColors](./harp-mapview.tileresourceusage.numcolors.md) | number | The amount of colors used by a tile. |
|  [numGeometries](./harp-mapview.tileresourceusage.numgeometries.md) | number | The amount of geometries used by a tile. |
|  [numMaterials](./harp-mapview.tileresourceusage.nummaterials.md) | number | The amount of materials used by a tile. |
|  [numObjects](./harp-mapview.tileresourceusage.numobjects.md) | number | The amount of objects used by a tile. |
|  [numVertices](./harp-mapview.tileresourceusage.numvertices.md) | number | The amount of vertices used by a tile. |
